name: Balls n Bricks
description:
Tap the screen at the right moment to get the best angle. Shoot balls and break all bricks before they fall down. 

Collect coins and upgrade your turret. Invite friends and compare your high score in the leaderboard. Also, there are a lot of achievements to collect.
